hint_dist_user.name: chaos
hint_dist_user.description: A completely randomized hint distribution with single copies

Colossus (Spirit Temple).text: They say that catching #Big Poes# leads to #a Piece of Heart#.

DMC (Bombable Wall).text: They say that racing #Dampé's ghost# rewards...^ #the Gerudo Card# and #a Bomb Bag#.

DMC (Upper Grotto).text: They say that the #Frogs of Zora River# will reward you with...^ #the Prescription# and #a Recovery Heart#.

DMT (Biggoron).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

DMT (Storms Grotto).text: They say that the #Ocarina of Time# teaches #Saria's Song#.

Dodongos Cavern (Bombable Wall).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

GC (Maze).text: They say that the #Skull Mask and Mask of Truth# reward...^ #Nayru's Love# and #a Map of the Deku Tree#.

GC (Medigoron).text: They say that a #ravaged village# mourns with #the Sun's Song#.

GV (Waterfall).text: They say that a #storm within Gerudo's Fortress# reveals a #generic grotto#.

Graveyard (Shadow Temple).text: They say that #inside Ganon's Castle# is on the path of #gold#.

HC (Malon).text: They say that #the Requiem of Spirit# can be found inside #the Temple of Time#.

HC (Rock Wall).text: They say that #the Forest Temple# is on the way of the hero.

HC (Storms Grotto).text: They say that a #storm within Zora's Domain# reveals an #Octorok# guarding a rich pool.

HF (Cow Grotto).text: They say that in the #central rooms of the well# spiders hold...^ #a Gold Skulltula Token# and #a Heart Container#.
